Reminder No: 2 - Send important documents
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c},
This is a second reminder that you need to submit some or all of the original documents below. You will not be able to gain a place on Step Forward without submitting them and we can’t put you through to an interview with employers without all your documents.
These original documents are:
GCSE Maths Grade C and above or Level 2 equivalent
AND
GCSE English Language Grade C and above or Level 2 equivalent
AND
EU passport OR UK birth certificate OR UK driving license (provisional or full) with a UK birthplace in section 3 of the license
OR
NON-EU passport with passport stamp and letter from the Home Office stating right to remain and duration of stay in the UK.
There are three ways you can submit your documents to us:
1. Bring the documents to the next assessment 2. Send your documents to us via recorded delivery 3. Bring your documents to us in person The next assessment is taking place during February half term between Mon 16th – Fri 20th
Send your documents via recorded delivery to:
Step Forward c/o Paige Trotman The Challenge 39 York Road Elizabeth House Mezzanine Floor SE1 7NQ
The Step Forward offices are open Mon – Fri 9am – 5pm
Email paige.trotman@the-challenge.org to book a time for you to come in Email step.forward@the-challenge.org to tell us that you’re going to come to the assessment with your documents Remember to include a return address so we can send your documents back to you Email step.forward@the-challenge.org to let us know the date you sent your documents We will send your documents back via recorded delivery within 2 working days of receiving them.
Whatever way you choose to submit your documents, we must receive them at the very latest by Friday 13th February.
Please ignore this message if you have sent your documents to us.
Contact us as soon as possible if you have any questions.
Step Forward
